mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lx_emp(emp_id, emp_mobile, emp_pass, emp_name, emp_cover, emp_sex, is_use, dateline,hx_username,level_id,emp_up, emp_number) VALUES (#{empId}, #{empMobile}, #{empPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empCover}, #{empSex}, #{isUse}, #{dateline},#{hxUsername},#{level_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{emp_up ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{emp_number ,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT lp.*,ll.level_name as levelName,latt.lx_attribute_nick as lx_attribute_nick, lc.count as jfcount,lpac.package_money as package_money, lcom.company_id as company_id,lcom.company_name as company_name, lcom.company_person as company_person,lcom.company_tel as company_tel, lcom.company_address as company_address,lcom.lat_company as lat_company,lcom.lng_company as lng_company,lcom.company_pic as company_pic , lcom.is_check as is_check,lcom.provinceid as provinceid ,lcom.cityid as cityid,lcom.areaid as areaid from lx_emp lp LEFT JOIN lx_level ll ON ll.level_id = lp.level_id LEFT JOIN lx_attribute latt ON latt.lx_attribute_id = lp.lx_attribute_id LEFT JOIN lx_count lc ON lc.emp_id = lp.emp_id LEFT JOIN lx_package lpac ON lpac.emp_id = lp.emp_id LEFT JOIN company lcom ON lcom.emp_id = lp.emp_id WHERE lp.emp_mobile=#{mobile} OR lp.emp_number = #{emp_number}
